LanguageData.AteOrkMeal.stages.0.label: ate ork meal
LanguageData.AteOrkMeal.stages.0.description: I had to eat a disgusting, fungal meal. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.
LanguageData.AteOrkFungusDirect.stages.0.label: ate ork fungus
LanguageData.AteOrkFungusDirect.stages.0.description: I ate some green, slimy fungus. It was, possibly, the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted.
LanguageData.AteOrkFungusAsIngredient.stages.0.label: ate cooked ork fungus
LanguageData.AteOrkFungusAsIngredient.stages.0.descri: I ate a meal cooked from green, slimy fungus. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but there were glands and fluid pockets in there that I can't identify.
LanguageData.AteAwfulMeal_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: ate awful meal
LanguageData.AteAwfulMeal_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descripti: Dis stuff is disgusting, tasteless gloop. Better dan starvin, but not even da squigz wanna eat dat slop.
LanguageData.AteKibble_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AteKibble_OGOrkoid.stages.0.description: Dis stuff ain't great boss, its kinda krunchie
LanguageData.AteCorpse_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: ate corpse
LanguageData.AteCorpse_OGOrkoid.stages.0.description: I got ta eat da flesh of a dead'un without even butcherin or cookin it.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatDirect_OGOrkoid.stages.0: Ate da meat of anunva umie-like ting, raw, not bad. We should try cookin dis boss.
Ate da meat of anunva umie-like ting, raw, dis is da best boss! It was so... juciey.
LanguageData.AteOrkoidMeatDirect_OGOrkoid.stages.0.de: I ate da meat of one of da boyz, raw, it dont taste as good as umie's. lob it in da potz boss?
LanguageData.AteOrkoidMeatDirectCannibal_OGOrkoid.sta: I ate da meat of one of da boyz, raw, dis is great boss! we gotta lob it in da potz?
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngredient_OGOrkoid.st: Ate somfink made from da meat of anunva umie-like ting. itz pretty good boss.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngredientCannibal_OGO: Ate somfink made from da meat of anunva umie-like ting. So pleasurable. If only I could eat this all the time.
LanguageData.AteOrkoidMeatAsIngredient_OGOrkoid.stage: Ate somfink made from da meat of one of da boyz. itz pretty good boss.
LanguageData.AteOrkoidMeatAsIngredientCannibal_OGOrko: Ate somfink made from da meat of one of da boyz. So pleasurable. If only I could eat this all the time.
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatDirect_OGOrkoid.stages.0.de: Ate some gray, slimy bug bitz. tasted like squig-shit, da most disgusting ting I've ever tasted.
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatAsIngredient_OGOrkoid.stage: Ate somfink made from gray, slimy bug bitz. da other bitz partly covered the taste, but there were glands and fluid pockets in dere dat I can't identify.
LanguageData.AteRottenFood.stages.0.label: ate rotten food
LanguageData.AteRottenFood.stages.0.description: Ate nasty, rottin stuff. It was all gooey in my mouth, like umie brainz - but not in da good way.
LanguageData.AteWithoutTable_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: ate without table
LanguageData.AteWithoutTable_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descri: Wez bin eatin off da floorz like squigz. Can we get sumwhere ta eat our grub round ere?
LanguageData.SleptOutside_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: slept outside
LanguageData.SleptOutside_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descripti: I 'ad ta sleep outside wivout any protektion from da elementz.
LanguageData.SleptOnGround_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: slept on ground
LanguageData.SleptOnGround_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descript: I 'ad ta sleep on da floor like a squig.
LanguageData.SleptInCold_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: slept in the cold
LanguageData.SleptInCold_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descriptio: I 'ad ta sleep in da cold. We really need some 'eaters.
LanguageData.SleptInHeat_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: slept in the heat
LanguageData.SleptInHeat_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descriptio: I 'ad ta sleep in unbearable 'eat. Can't we giv sum grotz some fanz?
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: a prisoner was sold
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descr: Deze gitz sold a prisna inta slavery. Wot a waste of meat.
Deze gitz buried someone in an ornamented sarcophagus. Madness! wasting that meat!.
LanguageData.SoakingWet_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: soaking wet
LanguageData.ButcheredHumanlikeCorpse_OGOrkoid.stages: I woz playing at bein a Dok today.
I cut up one of da boyz like an squig fer da pot.
LanguageData.KnowButcheredHumanlikeCorpse_OGOrkoid.st: Looks like meats back on da menu boyz!
LanguageData.KnowButcheredOrkoidCorpse_OGOrkoid.stage: We butchered up one of da boyz like an animal.
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse_OGOrkoid.stages.0.d: Saw a dead ting laying on da ground. I hope it dont rot
LanguageData.ObservedLayingRottingCorpse_OGOrkoid.sta: I saw a rotting corpse laying on the ground. I cant believe we wasted that meat.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathAlly_OGOrkoid.stages.0.des: One of day boyz got wasted. Dey was alive, den they was dead, just like dat.
Saw somfink get deded. it were alive and now itz ded. I hope we can eatz dem
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathFamily_OGOrkoid.stages.0.d: I saw me mate get deded. 'E woz me mate for long as i can rememba...
I saw somfink die! Dat was intense! I cant wait to find out what they taste like!
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: darkness
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descri: We'ez been in da dark fer a while now boss....
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: ratty apparel
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descrip: Dez holes in ma stuff are gettin big. I gotta loot somfink new to wear..
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged_OGOrkoid.stages.1.label: tattered apparel
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged_OGOrkoid.stages.1.descrip: Dis ting looks like iz bout to fall apart. iz not even good fer scrapz!
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: tainted {0}
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descri: I nicked dis off a deded ting. I done looted it.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel_OGOrkoid.stages.1.label: tainted {0} (+1)
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel_OGOrkoid.stages.1.descri: I nicked dese off deded tings. More loot fer me!.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel_OGOrkoid.stages.2.label: tainted {0} (+2)
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel_OGOrkoid.stages.2.descri: I nicked all dese off deded tings. I iz startin to look like a proper Flash git!
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel_OGOrkoid.stages.3.label: tainted {0} etc
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel_OGOrkoid.stages.3.descri: I nicked all dis stuff off deded tings. Diz is da Best!
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy_OGOrkoid.stages: Dis makes me look Propa scary now dunnit!
We iz an 'Ard boy, All will know my powa.
Dem dat i scalped to make deze cloves aren't smiling, but dey make *me* happy.
The flesh! The flesh signals my triumph!
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied_OGOrkoid.stages.0.d: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. our ancestors would be ashamed.
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: brawler has ranged weapon
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy_OGOrkoid.stages.0.descrip: Oi boss!! Wotz dis rubbish!! I want ta get up close and Smash dem gitz!!
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.0.description: I'za Flash git! I wantz a really impressive gaff.
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.1.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.1.description: I'za Flash git! Dis place iz pafetic! I wantz a really impressive gaff.
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.2.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.2.description: I'za Flash git! Dis place isn't nearly good enough. I wantz a really impressive gaff.
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.3.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.3.description: I'za Flash git! Dis place isn't good enough. I wantz a really impressive gaff.
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.4.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy_OGOrkoid.stages.4.description: I'za Flash git! Dis place isn't quite good enough. I wantz a really impressive gaff.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.0.label: ascetic has awful bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.0.description: Dis gaff iz all i need. somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.1.label: ascetic has dull bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.1.description: Dis gaff iz all i need. somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.2.label: ascetic has mediocre bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.2.description: Dis gaff iz alright. somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.5.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.5.description: Wotz da point in all dis stuff? all I needz iz somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.6.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.6.description: Wotz da point in all dis stuff? all I needz iz somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.7.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.7.description: Wotz da point in all dis stuff? all I needz iz somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.8.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.8.description: Wotz da point in all dis stuff? all I needz iz somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.9.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.9.description: Wotz da point in all dis stuff? all I needz iz somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.10.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.10.description: Wotz da point in all dis stuff? all I needz iz somwhere ta leave me choppa.
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.11.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic_OGOrkoid.stages.11.description: Wotz da point in all dis stuff? all I needz iz somwhere ta leave me choppa.
